results.noInsights: No AI insights available at this time.
results.upgradeDesc: Get the complete analysis with advanced features:

technical.label: Technical SEO
technical.description: Analysis indicates robust site architecture, but crawlability can be improved. Server response times are optimal.

content.label: Content Quality
content.description: Content relevance is high, but keyword density is below optimal levels. Readability scores suggest some pages are too complex.

onPage.label: On-Page SEO
onPage.description: Meta tags are present but some descriptions are duplicates. HTML header structure needs refinement for better hierarchy.

htmlDetails.titleDesc: The title tag is the first thing users see in search results. It should be concise (50-60 characters) and include your primary keyword.
htmlDetails.descDesc: A brief summary of the page content. Well-written descriptions (150-160 characters) can significantly improve click-through rates.
htmlDetails.urlDesc: The web address of your page. Short, descriptive URLs are easier for users to read and search engines to crawl.
htmlDetails.statusDesc: The server response code. A 200 OK status means the page loaded successfully. 4xx or 5xx codes indicate errors.
htmlDetails.timeDesc: How quickly your server responds. Faster response times (under 500ms) improve user experience and crawl budget.
htmlDetails.countDesc: The total number of words on the page. Sufficient content length (typically 600+ words) helps cover topics in depth for better ranking.
